subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] The world is catching up!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Yeah, there are examples on the sites I went to, not remembering now which 
thery were, and the favorites that I marked are at work. I have had voices 
like that too, using the crowd noise from one of our school board meetings. 
There was some ghopst voices mixed in. These entities will speak with almost 
anything if they know someone is/will be listening.

http://www.itcbridge.com/forum/ Here's a very interesting forum for EVP/ITC.

Frank
